divs: Sighting DetailsI tried to give a detailed descripton and it dropped the report twice. I will submit it so it is sent in you may contact me as soon as you can. I also know that a person spotted the same ufo on July 1, 2011 roughly a half mile from were it was spotted by me and this person.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Salisbury
There were no other sightings in Salisbury on or around November 24th 2011
Summary: ufo appeared and vanished in about 3 seconds
